While admittedly this game is rather short, it is still fun and interesting. I really liked going through twice to get all the achievements, especially The One Free Bullet which is certainly a bit of a challenge. This game was the perfect opportunity for achievements such as that. One interesting thing throughout the game is Alyx, as she is one of the main focuses since this game is about interacting and progressing with her, and helping each other out. I don't have much else to say. It was a fun game and I would recommend for those that want more from the Half-Life 2 series that finished the main Half-Life 2 already.

Отличное продолжение второй части! Прошёл за день, да оно и неудивительно, игра короче предшественника в 5 раз.
Однако хуже она от этого не стала. Ну, а по мне так даже стала лучше в этом аспекте.
